### getAnalysisUsage() {#a2d9b6f1892dc9fc078273cf43fe05e0e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LoadStoreOpt::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp;) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - This function should be overriden by passes that need analysis information to do their job.

If a pass specifies that it uses a particular analysis result to this function, it can then use the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass/#a4863e5e463fb79955269fbf7fbf52b80">getAnalysis&lt;AnalysisType&gt;()</a> function, below.

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LoadStoreOpt::addStoreToCandidate (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gstore">GStore</a> &amp; MI, StoreMergeCandidate &amp; C)</>}>
If the given store is valid to be a member of the candidate, add it and return true.

Otherwise, returns false.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-h/#l00130">130</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-h">LoadStoreOpt.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-cpp/#l00512">512</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-cpp">LoadStoreOpt.cpp</a>.

### doSingleStoreMerge() {#ad0de1adb090d28b58adf750e0149c756}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LoadStoreOpt::doSingleStoreMerge (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gstore">GStore</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Stores)</>}>
Perform a merge of all the stores in <code>Stores</code> into a single store.

Erases the old stores from the block when finished. 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
true if merging was done. It may fail to perform a merge if there are issues with materializing legal wide values.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-h/#l00143">143</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-h">LoadStoreOpt.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-cpp/#l00358">358</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-cpp">LoadStoreOpt.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Initialize some target-specific data structures for the store merging optimization.

### mergeStores() {#a2a161f3be6191abfc464e29b8075a58b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LoadStoreOpt::mergeStores (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gstore">GStore</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; StoresToMerge)</>}>
Merges the stores in the given vector into a wide store.

<code>returns</code> true if at least some of the stores were merged. This may decide not to merge stores if heuristics predict it will not be worth it.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-h/#l00138">138</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-h">LoadStoreOpt.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-cpp/#l00304">304</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-cpp">LoadStoreOpt.cpp</a>.

### mergeTruncStore() {#ac0f5a88c5ca663b5e42caf1e2cb03131}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LoadStoreOpt::mergeTruncStore (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gstore">GStore</a> &amp; StoreMI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl">SmallPtrSetImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gstore">GStore</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; DeletedStores)</>}>
Match a pattern where a wide type scalar value is stored by several narrow stores.

Fold it into a single store or a BSWAP and a store if the targets supports it.

Assuming little endian target: i8 &#42;p = ... i32 val = ... p&#91;0&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 0) &amp; 0xFF; p&#91;1&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 8) &amp; 0xFF; p&#91;2&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 16) &amp; 0xFF; p&#91;3&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 24) &amp; 0xFF; =&gt; &#42;((i32)p) = val;

i8 &#42;p = ... i32 val = ... p&#91;0&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 24) &amp; 0xFF; p&#91;1&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 16) &amp; 0xFF; p&#91;2&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 8) &amp; 0xFF; p&#91;3&#93; = (val &gt;&gt; 0) &amp; 0xFF; =&gt; &#42;((i32)p) = BSWAP(val);

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-h/#l00148">148</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-h">LoadStoreOpt.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-cpp/#l00711">711</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-cpp">LoadStoreOpt.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### LegalStoreSizes {#ae945ce709f9941624149596e99df718f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;unsigned, BitVector&gt; llvm::LoadStoreOpt::LegalStoreSizes</>}>
A map between address space numbers and a bitvector of supported stores sizes.

Each bit in the bitvector represents whether a store size of that bit&#39;s value is legal. E.g. if bit 64 is set, then 64 bit scalar stores are legal.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-h/#l00160">160</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/loadstoreopt-h">LoadStoreOpt.h</a>.
